00217 inline void PreprocessorStatistics::updateTotalTime ()
00218 {
00219     totalTime_ = 0.0;
00220 
00221     if ( averagingFilteringTime_.get() != 0 )
00222         totalTime_ += *averagingFilteringTime_;
00223 
00224     if ( globalThresholdingTime_.get() != 0 )
00225         totalTime_ += *globalThresholdingTime_;
00226 
00227     if ( templateFilteringTime_.get() != 0 )
00228         totalTime_ += *templateFilteringTime_;
00229 
00230     if ( segmentationTime_.get() != 0 )
00231         totalTime_ += *segmentationTime_;
00232 
00233     if ( patternsBuildingTime_.get() != 0 )
00234         totalTime_ += *patternsBuildingTime_;
00235 
00236     if ( skeletonizationTime_.get() != 0 )
00237         totalTime_ += *skeletonizationTime_;
00238 
00239     if ( slantingCorrectionTime_.get() != 0 )
00240         totalTime_ += *slantingCorrectionTime_;
00241 }
